alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Daggett County through 300 PM MDT... At 232 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 35 miles north of Dinosaur, or 38 miles northeast of Vernal, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar and satellite estimates. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Daggett County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
